title: Natural Energy Field Services, LLC | LinkedIn
description: Natural Energy Field Services, LLC | 3,886 followers on LinkedIn. #nefsfamily | Natural energy field services, LLC (NEFS) is a provider of third-party field support services including construction inspection and quality control personnel, land/right-of-way acquisition, and survey to the energy industry. Our goal is to provide our clients with qualified, experienced, and safety-conscious personnel that satisfy their project needs and help surpass their company goals. Our management TEAM consists of highly-skilled personnel with relative energy-concentrated field and administrative experience.
cleaned_text: Taos and Gauge will keep em coming! Also listen in for the type of inspectors we are currently in search of. [#nefsfamily](https://www.linkedin.com/signup?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fnefsfamily&trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card-text) [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/taos-hays-65182394?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_reshare_feed-actor-image) Construction Manager - Business Development It's human nature to criticize what we don't understand. As an inspector for over 10 years, I never understood just how important my résumé was to my career. Now that I'm on the recruiting/BD side, I get a front row seat to witnessing the recruiting process and how a résumé is usually the deciding factor between the haves and have nots. I hope this video helps and, if well receieved, I look forward to making my dog, Gauge, costar in a few more. I want to be clear. I am not an export and my advice is very industry specific. Just trying to help my fellow inspectors land that next project. Cheers! [Thays@nees.us.com](mailto:Thays@nees.us.com?trk=organization_guest_main-feed-card_reshare-text) - 4 Non
